name: Slime Condensate
desc: A thick coating found on slimes. Most commonly seen material in elemental workshops.

name: Slime Secretions
desc: Mildly purified slime secretions. Harmful to the skin. Please avoid direct exposure.

name: Slime Concentrate
desc: Concentrated slime essence. When left alone, it will begin to move on its own.

name: Damaged Mask
desc: A broken bone mask that once belonged to some hilichurl.

name: Stained Mask
desc: A bone mask covered in unidentifiable stains, that emanates a mysterious odor.

name: Onimous Mask
desc: A glossy bone mask with oil markings painted on it, meant to intimidate enemies.

name: Chaos Device
desc: Comes from ancient defunct relic structures

name: Chaos Circuit
desc: Comes from ancient defunct relic structures

name: Chaos Core
desc: Comes from ancient defunct relic structures

name: Iron Chunk
desc: This iron chunk can be turned into a multitude of handy items in the hands of a skilled craftsman.

name: Crystal Chunk
desc: An uncut crystal. Only professional craftsmanship can bring out its true value.
